properties.areaDesc: South Central Utah; San Rafael Swell; Glen Canyon Recreation Area/Lake Powell
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 2 at 2:32PM MST until February 3 at 10:00PM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest gusts up to 55 mph this evening, shifting to
the northwest Monday morning.

* WHERE...San Rafael Swell, Glen Canyon Recreation Area/Lake
Powell, and South Central Utah.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 PM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Strong crosswinds will create hazardous driving conditions for
high profile vehicles and those towing trailers. Wind sensitive
operations will be impacted. Strong winds will create hazardous
boating conditions on Lake Powell.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

The strong winds will create dangerous boating conditions on area
lakes. These winds will create very choppy water and generate
large waves which could capsize or swamp small craft. For your
personal safety, operators of small craft are urged to postpone
their outings until the winds subside.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM MST MONDAY
